WITH RECURSIVE CTE AS ( SELECT b_no ,b_title ,b_writer ,b_regdate ,b_content ,b_readcnt ,b_refno ,b_depth ,b_notice ,CAST(LPAD(b_no, 10, 0) AS CHAR(3000)) path ,b_origin ,b_secret ,b_pwd FROM board WHERE b_refno = 0 UNION ALL SELECT b.b_no ,b.b_title ,b.b_writer ,b.b_regdate ,b.b_content ,b.b_readcnt ,b.b_refno ,b.b_depth ,b.b_notice ,CONCAT(a.path, ',', b.b_no) AS path ,b.b_origin ,b.b_secret ,b.b_pwd FROM CTE a INNER JOIN board b ON a.b_no = b.b_refno )
SELECT b_no, b_title, b_writer, b_regdate, b_content, b_readcnt, b_refno, b_depth, path, b_origin, b_secret, b_pwd FROM CTE WHERE b_notice != 1
